#!/bin/bash

RED='\033[0;31m'

## è®¸å¯è¯

# åˆ›å»ºæˆ–ç¼–è¾‘ SSH é…ç½®
cat > ~/.ssh/config << 'EOF'
# GitHub é…ç½®
Host github.com
    User git
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_github
    Hostname ssh.github.com
    Port 443
    IdentitiesOnly yes

# Gitee é…ç½®
Host gitee.com
    User git
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_gitee
    IdentitiesOnly yes

# é€šç”¨é…ç½®
Host *
    AddKeysToAgent yes
    UseKeychain yes
    ServerAliveInterval 60
    ServerAliveCountMax 5
EOF

# è®¾ç½®æ­£ç¡®æƒé™
chmod 600 ~/.ssh/config

cat >> ~/.ssh/config << 'EOF'
# ä¸ªäºº GitHub
Host github.com-personal
    HostName github.com
    User git
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_github_personal

# å·¥ä½œ GitHub
Host github.com-work
    HostName github.com
    User git
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_github_work
EOF

# SSH è¿æ¥ä¼˜åŒ–
cat >> ~/.ssh/config << 'EOF'
Host *
    Compression yes
    ControlMaster auto
    ControlPath ~/.ssh/sockets/%r@%h:%p
    ControlPersist 4h
    TCPKeepAlive yes
EOF

# åˆ›å»º sockets ç›®å½•
mkdir -p ~/.ssh/sockets
